articles.title: Chris Hayes breaks down Soleimani's influence in the Middle East
articles.description: Chris Hayes looks at the role Qassem Soleimani played in shaping the Middle East.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Filkins: Iran will retaliate for U.S. killing of Soleimani
articles.description: New Yorker writer Dexter Filkins says we don't know where or when Iran will respond. But he has no doubt that it's coming.

articles.title: Iran vows ‘revenge’ over top general’s killing
articles.description: After the U.S. drone killing of a top Iranian general on Thursday, the world waited for Iran to respond.

articles.title: Chris Hayes: ‘I have heard critiques about having a ‘plan’ for the entirety of my adult life’
articles.description: Chris Hayes comments on how he has heard the same conversation throughout his entire adult life about which military "plan" is going to finally work.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: ‘No question there will be retaliation:’ Majd on Iran’s imminent response
articles.description: "There's no question there will be retaliation," said author and journalist Hooman Majd, of Iran's response to Thursday's drone strike.

articles.title: Rep. Max Rose on the importance of diplomacy throughout history
articles.description: Rep. Rose (D-NY): “The pathway to stability has not been solely through military action. It’s been through politics and negotiation.”

articles.title: MTP Daily 1/3/20
articles.description: MTP Daily is a public affairs program hosted by Chuck Todd that follows the Trump administration and features the top news-makers of the day as they analyze and break down the issues.

articles.title: Rep. Dean: Mitch McConnell can’t whisk away that Trump was impeached
articles.description: As Congress kicks off the new year, Democrats are trying to put pressure on Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell to allow witnesses at the impeachment trial.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Iraq strike generates mixed reactions in Congress
articles.description: Reaction to the operation from members of Congress was sharply mixed, with Democrats blasting the Trump administration for failing to alert Congress about the strike.

articles.title: Richard Engel on US airstrike that killed Soleimani: This is...
articles.description: Qasem Soleimani’s death is the latest in a series of escalating incidents that followed President Trump's decision to unilaterally withdraw America from the Iran nuclear deal.
